long_description: The Wallaroo Sophia wide-brimmed hat gives your little one the protection she needs. Kid-inspired graphics and splashes of color get her revved up for the day. With a UPF 50+ rating, soft cotton fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Flip the brim up to show off matching gingham lining inside. Bright stitching and clever use of colorful buttons and beads make this an irresistibly fun hat. Hand wash the Wallaroo Sophia hat in cold water.
short_description: The Wallaroo Sophia wide-brimmed hat gives your little one the protection she needs. Kid-inspired graphics and splashes of color get her revved up for the day.
